entry.title: India's Capital Hunkers Down for Annual Airpocalypse
entry.content: New Delhi’s residents are used to a blanket of smog that blots out the sky but residents are reeling more than usual this year.

entry.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What to Know.
entry.content: Militants from the Gaza Strip abducted civilians and soldiers in the attack on Israel.

entry.title: Children in Mental-Health Crisis Surge Into Hospital E.R.s
entry.content: Rising cases and long waits for treatment have desperate families turning to emergency departments for help. “We’re the place of last resort to mop up after the system has failed.”
